Message:
Someone making the
witches go out of control...
Noah and the Mystical Beasts...

Nations here falling to
ruins from the Curses...

Our homeland being burned
by the Dragon of Revelation,
Apocalypse...

The Duke of Fran
and the witches...

You, my lord,
who journeyed from
our land around the
continent of Centrea...

This world feels almost like
a mirror image of our own.

Perhaps because of that,
I feel that I simply cannot
turn a blind eye to
what is happening here.

That may even be the reason
I ended up in this world
in the first place.

No... Perhaps there is
no rhyme or reason to
me being here at all.

Whether it was
meant to be or not,
I want to be of use to
everyone in this world.
